text: Thomas Stuart Chambers (born 22 May 1977) is an English actor and television personality. He is best known for portraying the role of Sam Strachan in the BBC medical dramas Holby City and Casualty. Chambers has also had starring roles on Waterloo Road, Father Brown and Emmerdale. In 2008, he won the sixth series of Strictly Come Dancing with his partner Camilla Dallerup. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Derbyshire
title: Tom Chambers (actor)
